Html:
Hi,

Chrome shows this deprecation warning 'webkitIndexedDB' is deprecated. Please use 'indexedDB' instead.

The easiest solution would be to amend the following line @8516 in v1.1.2
  • var indexedDB = window.mozIndexedDB || window.webkitIndexedDB || window.msIndexedDB || window.indexedDB;
To this:
  • var indexedDB = window.indexedDB || window.mozIndexedDB || window.webkitIndexedDB || window.msIndexedDB;
Are there plans to release an update including this change?

thanks,
sigman
